index.title: Air360 - The best UX analysis tool for e-commerce

privacy-policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy-policy.content: We respect the privacy of our customers, partners, suppliers of products or services, and clients. The purpose of this Privacy Policy is to provide you with information about how we collect personal information when you use this Web site; how we collect other information about your interactions with this Web site without identifying you as an individual; how we use, process, and disclose the information we collect; and your choices about how the information information about your choices regarding how the information is collected and used.

product.title: Product
product.description: Air360 automatically tracks customer behavior and makes it easy to create the best website for your customers with a variety of features such as Chrome extensions and session replay.
product.ogDescription: Air360 automatically tracks customer behavior and makes it easy to create the best website for your customers with a variety of features such as Chrome extensions and session replay.

ga4-migration.title: The eCommerce experience analytics solution that will help you simplify your Google Analytics 4 migrationThe eCommerce experience analytics solution that will help you simplify your Google Analytics 4 migration
ga4-migration.description: If you are here, it is because you are feeling under pressure with the sunset of Universal Analytics in July 2023.This Google Analytics 4 migration might be overwhelming, but Air360 can help.Watch our quick video that explains how you can solve your challenges in this migration.

compliance.title: Compliance
compliance.desc: Fully compliant with GDPR & CCPA privacy acts

security.title: Security
security.desc: Your data is safe, secure, and always available​

card1.title: Privacy by default
card1.desc: Air360 automatically disallows the capture of any sensitive or personal data that a user enters in an input field of your web store.

card2.title: Right to erasure
card2.desc: GDPR requires you to be able to delete a given user and all its related data. Air360 offers a function that will allow you to delete a specific user and related sessions with just a single click.

card3.title: Restrict specific data acquisition
card3.desc: Air360 enables you to go further by also hiding explicitly parts of your pages from being recorded during session replays.

card4.title: Right of access & data portability
card4.desc: You can retrieve specific user details simply by going through our application or using our API.

card1.title: Monitoring of our Tracking pixel
card1.desc: Constantly conducted to detect any malicious modification and ensure its delivery, integrity and safety.

card2.title: State-of-the-art encryption
card2.desc: Used in all Air360 products for data in transit and at rest.

card3.title: Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)
card3.desc: Required for all our users to access to Air360 application adding an extra layer of security and keeping your accounts safe.

card4.title: Third-party security audits
card4.desc: Conducted regularly and before major releases, including penetration tests and vulnerability scans.

card5.title: Security best practices
card5.desc: Reviewed by third party companies regularly when important updates are performed on our systems.

card6.title: Customer data processed & stored in the EU
card6.desc: Air360 core systems are hosted on OVHcloud and Amazon Web Services (AWS) servers located in France and Ireland and leverage all the security and compliance provided by OVHcloud/AWS: ISO (9001, 27001, 27017, and 27018), SOC 1, 2, and 3, PCI DSS.

security.title: Security & Compliance
security.desc: We are fully committed to providing features that help you be compliant with GDPR by taking a privacy by design approach. As well as partnering with the best in class security providers to keep all your data safe.

card1.title: Auto-Tracking
card1.desc: Track every single interaction :screen view, single tap, double tap, swipe, pinch...

card2.title: App crashes &  errors
card2.desc: Understand crashes better than ever. Automatically track errors, see the root cause to fix them right ahead.

card3.title: Non-Sampled
card3.desc: Capture 100% of your data. Our Auto-tracking technology does not sample.

card4.title: Retroactive
card4.desc: Our tagless technology allows you to keep track of all your user behaviors from the day Air360 was installed.

website-analysis.title: Get insights fast and turn them into actions
website-analysis.description: Air360 brings data analysts and business profiles together on the same mission. Increase conversion, unlock missed revenue, and turn frustrated users into loyal customers.

app-analysis.title: Discover your App user journey
app-analysis.description: User behavior from your mobile app users won’t be a black hole anymore. With Air360 collect all user interactions , discover main paths of behavior, and reveal frictions & obstacles during their journey.

salesforce.desc: Unify marketing, sales, service, commerce, and IT on the world's #1 CRM
salesforce.back-desc: Our  Integrations allows you to  enrich Air360 with Salesforce properties as well as push Air360 behavioral data to Salesforce to activate segments, and visualize users and metrics.

ab-tasty.desc: Build end-to-end experiences that drive growth across all digital channels.
ab-tasty.back-desc: Our A/B Tasty connector allows you to push and pull campaign IDs, and segments  from Air360 to A/B Tasty and viceversa.

coveo.desc: With the Coveo Relevance CloudTM, intelligent enterprise search is just the beginning.
coveo.back-desc: Create behavioral segments inside Air360 that can be pushed to Coveo to create personalization campaigns.

shopify.desc: Connect all your behavioral data and visualize it in Air360 in one click.
shopify.back-desc: Use our Shopify plugin to connect Air360  to understand your users’ behavior.  If you are a Shopify Plus user, you will be able to track checkout behavior as well.

mailchimp.desc: Bring your audience data, marketing channels, and insights together.
mailchimp.back-desc: Activate Air360 Segments through Mailchimp  to make personalized email campaigns.

looker.desc: Turn your data into compelling stories of data visualization art.
looker.back-desc: Extract all metrics and insights from Air360 and visualize them with beautiful dashboards  in Looker.

one-trust.desc: OneTrust empowers tomorrow's leaders to succeed through trust and impact.
one-trust.back-desc: Our Integrations allows you to enrich Air360 with Salesforce properties as well as push Air360 behavioral data to Salesforce to activate segments, and visualize users and metrics.

power-bi.desc: The unified, scalable platform for self-service and enterprise business intelligence (BI).
power-bi.back-desc: Extract all metrics and insights from Air360 and visualize them in PowerBI

segment.desc: Data governance, control and tools you need to manage your customer data.
segment.back-desc: Our Integrations allows you to  enrich Air360 with Segment by Twilio properties as well as push Air360 behavioral data to Segment by Twilio to activate segments, and visualize users and metrics.

google.desc: Fully-managed, serverless data warehouse that enables scalable analysis over petabytes of data.
google.back-desc: Push out all Air360 metrics and segments to Bigquery.

sftp.desc: File protocol for transferring large files over the web.
sftp.back-desc: Push out all Air360 segments to your SFTP solution.

get-feedback.desc: Get in-the-moment feedback from your customers.
get-feedback.back-desc: User or Get feedback connector to  to unlock the full potential of your service and link user feedback with their session replay to fully understand the root cause of their bad experiences

data-integrations.title: ユーザーの行動が、あなたのテックエコシステムの中心に
data-integrations.content: Air360では、すべてのビジネスや業界には独自のデジタルエコシステムとKPIが存在することを知っています。そのため、私たちはスタックアプローチを採用しています。複数のビジネステックソリューション間で、行動セグメントやインサイトを可能な限り柔軟に共有できます。

card1.title: Auto-Tracking
card1.desc: Capture every  click, scroll, pageview, tap,  any user interaction by default  with your CSS & html elements.

card2.title: Plug and Play
card2.desc: Use Air360 total capacity from day 1, avoid extra configuration steps, and reduce time to insights.

card3.title: Tagless
card3.desc: Forget about manual  tagging to track any product, purchase, or user interaction even if your  website changes its design constantly.

card4.title: Codeless
card4.desc: User your tag management system to implement Air360 and track any data type without requiring technical deployment.

data-collection.title: Collect & Visualize user behavior in 3 clicks
data-collection.content: Stop straggling with technical deployments, and start collecting all behavior and purchase data from your users with a simple and codeless installation through your tag management system.

events-segments.title: Easily get the user behavior you need
events-segments.content: Air360 is designed for data and business users to get full visibility of your users. Our solution allows you to define behavioral events and segments to use for analysis, marketing with just few clicks.
